DOC.brief_summary: The objective study compare cholesterol absorption metabolism feed diet naturally low high phytosterols . All meal prepare metabolic kitchen analyze phytosterols . In randomized crossover design group 25 healthy subject consume diet contain either 100 mg/day 600 mg/day phytosterols 4 week . At end dietary period percent cholesterol absorption , fecal cholesterol excretion LDL cholesterol level measure . The hypothesis LDL cholesterol cholesterol excretion improve high phytosterol diet even though macronutrient composition , mineral intake fiber consumption similar .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Low High Phytosterol Diets With Respect Cholesterol Metabolism
DOC.criteria: Male female race ethnicity 18 80 year age , inclusive ; Body mass index 2035 kg/m2 ; LDLcholesterol 100189 mg/dL base average duplicate screening measure . If two LDLC level differ 30 mg/dL , third test schedule three result average ; Free chronic disease ; Willing eat food provide Center diet period ; Willing consume 1 alcoholic drink per day . Willing abstain consumption alcohol 48hours prior blood draw day ; Willing drink 5 cup caffeinecontaining beverage day . Age < 18 > 80 year ; Based duplicate screen laboratory value : 1 ) LDLC > = 190 mg/dL ; 2 ) TG > = 250 mg/dL ; 3 ) blood pressure > = 160 mm Hg systolic 95 mm Hg diastolic ; Documented presence atherosclerotic disease ; Diabetes mellitus ; Renal , hepatic , endocrine , gastrointestinal , hematological systemic disease ; Body mass index > 35 ; For woman , pregnancy , breast feeding postpartum < 6 month ; For woman , perimenopausal ; History drug alcohol abuse ; History depression mental illness require treatment medication within last 6 month ; Multiple food allergy significant food preference restriction would interfere diet adherence ; Chronic use overthecounter medication would interfere study endpoint include laxative antacid ; Lifestyle schedule incompatible study protocol ; Planned continue use dietary supplement study trial ; Taking lipidlowering , medication know affect blood cholesterol
